description:
It`s Gonta. Tomorrow is finally the day of our Inari Shrine`s festival. Thanks to the help of Yuzu and the others, our preparations are perfect! So tonight Yuzu and the others are staying over. Of course somehow the ghost stories got started... Ahhh, I`m totally not scared (sweat). Yeah, not scared...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 寝覚月スリラーナイト
